scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const undiciFolderPath = path.join('node_modules', 'undici-types'); if (fs.existsSync(undiciFolderPath)) { try { console.log('Temporarily renaming undici-types directory...'); fs.renameSync(undiciFolderPath, path.join('node_modules', 'undici-types.bak')); console.log('Successfully renamed'); } catch (e) { console.error('Failed to rename undici-types', e); } }"
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const undiciBackupPath = path.join('node_modules', 'undici-types.bak'); if (fs.existsSync(undiciBackupPath)) { try { console.log('Restoring undici-types directory...'); fs.renameSync(undiciBackupPath, path.join('node_modules', 'undici-types')); console.log('Successfully restored'); } catch (e) { console.error('Failed to restore undici-types', e); } }"
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
